title: Action Music Pack
description: Original orchestral and hybrid themes for action games. Cinematic, dramatic, and intense soundscapes perfect for creating epic, adrenaline-pumping atmospheres.
longDescription:
Unleash the full potential of your action game with our "Epic Action Music Pack." This collection features meticulously crafted original orchestral and hybrid orchestral themes designed to elevate your game's intensity, excitement, and immersive experience. Whether you're developing a high-octane battle sequence, a dramatic showdown, or an epic adventure, this music pack provides the perfect soundtrack to bring your game to life.


| YOUTUBE PREVIEW


What's Inside:

  • 12 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structure;
  • 48 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and stingers;
  • 34 minutes of original music (1 hour including loops and stinger versions)
  • Audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format


Use Cases:

  • Action and Adventure Games: Enhance the excitement and immersion of your game with epic orchestral scores.
  • Cinematic Cutscenes: Add dramatic impact to your game's story with cinematic-quality music.
  • Boss Fights and Battles: Intensify the thrill of combat with powerful, adrenaline-pumping tracks.
  • Exploration and Quests: Create a rich, atmospheric backdrop for your gameâ€™s exploratory moments.
  • Character Themes: Give your heroes and villains memorable musical identities with distinctive themes.


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
technicalDetails:
Tracklist:

  1. Terrible Damage (main, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  2. Dangerous Escalation (main, 2 loops)
  3. Hunted (main, 2 loops)
  4. Titanic Battle (main, 3 loops, 1 stinger)
  5. Fast Dramatic Score (main, 2 loops)
  6. Fall Of An Empire (main, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  7. Dystopian (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  8. Prepare For Mission (main, 2 loops, 3 stingers)
  9. Avenged (main, 1 loop, 1 stinger)
  10. Enduring Tension (main, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  11. Showdown (main, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  12. Epic Rise (main, 2 loops)


Number of Audio Wavs: 48

Number of Audio Cues: 48

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of unique audio provided: 34:10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com

Important/Additional Notes: if you want to clear a claim on your Youtube promotional video, please fill this form : https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
